text:
Potato is a 70-person developer-lead agency based in London, UK with offices in Bristol, Amsterdam, Sydney & San Francisco. Our clients include Google, PayPal, a number of startups and other agencies such as BBH & Mother. We're hiring for a variety of positions in a variety of locations, freelance & full time, including senior UX designers in London, Mountain View & Bristol UK.

http://p.ota.to/jobs/
